author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Video games are fantastic and I love playing them but after a decade of professionally breaking them I must say they have gotten very easy. It does not help that certain publishers like ubisoft and EA seem obsessed with turning the default difficulty into a frictionless experience with incredible hand holding that removes the suspense and purpose of the game. That brings me to the focus today. A game that on the normal difficulty is an absolute walk in the park but thanks to some modifications I have made the game is now a proper stealth action fps with an experience that no other game can compete with! 

So today I am setting up an impossible challenge in a game with the most extreme permadeath difficulty I have dealt with when failure is inevitable and incredibly easy. So Can the spiffing brit beat this challenge or is it truly an impossible game!

Chapters:
02:00 - What is Going On
38:00 - The Meat and Potatos
39:40 - Outro


Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.yo
title: Can I Beat An Impossible Game?
